</style><style>.sn-item-col-wrap {

  opacity: 1;
  display: flex;
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-colitem-wrap.show-sn-select-wrap .sn-col-wrap .sn-col-item .col-item-label-wrap .sn-item-jt {
  transition: all 0.3s ease-out;

  transform: rotate(180deg);
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-colitem-wrap .sn-col-wrap {
  --icon-arrow-background: #f5f5f5;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 24px;
  height: 40px;
  flex-wrap: nowrap;
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-colitem-wrap .sn-col-wrap .sn-col-item {
  cursor: pointer;
  position: relative;
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-colitem-wrap .sn-col-wrap .sn-col-item .col-item-label-wrap {

  align-items: center;
  gap: 4px;
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-colitem-wrap .sn-col-wrap .sn-col-item .col-item-label-wrap .col-item-label {
  font-family: PingFang SC;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: normal;
  line-height: 20px;
  letter-spacing: 0px;
  font-variation-settings: "opsz" auto;
  /* 文字色/主要文字 */

  z-index: 1;
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-colitem-wrap .sn-col-wrap .sn-col-item .col-item-label-wrap .sn-item-jt {
  width: 13px;
  height: 13px;

  background-size: 100% 100%;
  background-position: center;
  transform: rotate(0deg);
  transition: all 0.3s ease-out;
  /* 0.5秒的平滑过渡 */
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-select-wrap {
  position: absolute;
  flex-direction: column;
  width: 200px;
  max-height: 168px;
  overflow-y: auto;
  /* 样式描述：中卡片，中输入框，中按钮等 */
  border-radius: 6px;
  opacity: 0;
  display: none;
  /* 背景色/白色 */
  background: #FFFFFF;
  /* 样式描述：默认使用，用于目录导航等在页面中属于中型面板的组件上 */
  box-shadow: 0px 4px 16px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.09);
  z-index: 11;
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-select-wrap::-webkit-scrollbar {
  width: 12px;
  /* 滚动条整体的宽度 */
  height: 12px;
  /* 水平滚动条的高度 */
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-select-wrap::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background-color: #888;
  /* 滑块的背景色 */
  border-radius: 6px;
  /* 滑块的圆角 */
  border: 3px solid #fff;
  /* 滑块的边框 */
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-select-wrap::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  /* 滚动条轨道的背景色 */
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-select-wrap .select-item {
  padding: 10px 8px;

  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  font-size: 14px;
}

}

  margin: 0;
  border: 0;
  padding: 0;
  font-family: Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Tahoma, Arial, PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei;
}
.conan-entry-root .icon {
  width: 1em;
  height: 1em;
  vertical-align: -0.15em;
  fill: currentColor;
  overflow: visible;
}
.conan-entry-root .open-icon {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  animation: 0.3s show;
}
.conan-entry-root .close-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-top: 15px;
  animation: 0.3s close-icon-show;
}
.conan-entry-root .conan-entry-dnd-area {
  position: fixed;
  width: 100px;
  height: 100%;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  animation: 0.2s ConanShow;
  opacity: 0.5;
  transition: all 0.3s;
}
.conan-entry-root .conan-entry-dnd-area.active {
  opacity: 1;
}

.conan-entry-layout {
  transition: all 0.3s;
  font-family: Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Tahoma, Arial, PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel {
  animation: 0.3s ConanShow;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.main-entry-panel, .conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.panel-conan, .conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.panel-akita {
  width: 340px !important;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel .panel-header {
  position: relative;
  height: 45px;
  line-height: 45px;
  color: #fff;
  background: #1A6DF8;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel .panel-header .back-btn {
  cursor: pointer;
  display: block;
  position: absolute;
  left: 15px;
  font-size: 14px;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel .panel-header .back-btn .back-btn-icon {
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
  vertical-align: -0.15em;
  fill: currentColor;
  overflow: visible;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel .panel-header span.panel-name {
  text-align: center;
  width: 100%;
  display: block;
  font-size: 16px;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.main-entry-panel {
  background-color: #0e68fc;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: contain;
  background-position: top;
  color: #fff;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  padding-bottom: 1px;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.main-entry-panel .entry-card {
  margin: 10px;
  transition: all 0.3s;
  border-radius: 5px;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.main-entry-panel .entry-card:last-child {
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.main-entry-panel .entry-card:hover {
  box-shadow: 0 3px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35);
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.main-entry-panel .top-info {
  padding: 15px;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.main-entry-panel .top-info h3 {
  font-size: 24px;
  margin-bottom: 5px;
  color: #fff;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.main-entry-panel .top-info p {
  font-size: 16px;
}

.conan-entry-container {
  position: fixed;
  right: 15px;
  bottom: 15px;
  z-index: 65534;
  border-radius: 3px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  color: #333;
  animation: 0.4s ConanShow;
}
.conan-entry-container, .conan-entry-container * {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.conan-entry-layout {
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 60px;
  z-index: 65535;
  background: #FFF;
  font-size: 12px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 18px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  animation: 0.5s ConanUpIn;
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.conan-entry-pop-tip {
  display: none;
  position: absolute;
  right: 50px;
  bottom: 0;
  min-height: 50px;
  padding: 10px 18px;
  margin-right: 15px;
  background: #fff;
  border-radius: 4px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 18px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  transition: all 0.3s;
  animation: 0.4s ConanRightIn;
}
.conan-entry-pop-tip a {
  display: inline-block;
  cursor: pointer;
  color: #1A6DF8;
}
.conan-entry-pop-tip a:hover {
  color: #5695ff;
}
.conan-entry-pop-tip-content {
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 30px;
  white-space: pre;
}
.conan-entry-pop-tip:hover .conan-entry-pop-tip-close {
  display: block;
  opacity: 1;
}
.conan-entry-pop-tip-close {
  opacity: 0;
  position: absolute;
  top: -10px;
  right: -10px;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background-color: #1A6DF8;
  background-image: url(https://img.alicdn.com/tfs/TB1TirlqNGYBuNjy0FnXXX5lpXa-32-32.png);
  background-size: 16px 16px;
  background-position: center;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.conan-entry-pop-tip-close:hover {
  background-color: #0066FF;
}
.conan-entry-pop-tip:before {
  position: absolute;
  content: "";
  width: 1px;
  height: 1px;
  bottom: 18px;
  right: -7px;
  border-left: 7px solid white;
  border-top: 6px solid transparent;
  border-bottom: 6px solid transparent;
}

.conan-entry-main-btn {
  position: absolute;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background-color: #1A6DF8;
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  font-size: 16px;
  color: #fff;
  z-index: 9999;
  border-radius: 3px;
  cursor: pointer;
  text-align: center;
  border-radius: 50%;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 18px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.01, 0.69, 0.49, 1);
}
.conan-entry-main-btn:hover .conan-entry-hide {
  display: block;
}
.conan-entry-main-btn .conan-entry-hide {
  display: none;
  transition: all 0.3s;
  position: absolute;
  right: -9px;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  background: #0073FF;
  line-height: 17px;
  text-align: center;
  color: #fff;
  cursor: pointer;
  bottom: 41px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  font-weight: 600;
  opacity: 0.6;
  font-size: 20px;
}
.conan-entry-main-btn .conan-entry-hide:hover {
  opacity: 0.8;
}
.conan-entry-main-btn .conan-entry-hide-icon {
  display: none;
}
.conan-entry-main-btn.conan-entry-hidden {
  width: 12px;
  border-radius: 2px;
}
.conan-entry-main-btn.conan-entry-hidden .open-icon, .conan-entry-main-btn.conan-entry-hidden .close-icon, .conan-entry-main-btn.conan-entry-hidden .conan-entry-hide {
  display: none !important;
}
.conan-entry-main-btn.conan-entry-hidden .conan-entry-hide-icon {
  display: block;
  height: 10px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  margin-top: -5px;
  left: 2px;
}

@keyframes ConanFadeDown {
  0% {
    transform: translateY(-65%);
    opacity: 0;
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    opacity: 1;
  }
}
@keyframes ConanRightIn {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(20px);
    opacity: 0;
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateX(0);
    opacity: 1;
  }
}
@keyframes ConanZoomOutIn {
  0% {
    transform: scale(1);
  }
  50% {
    transform: scale(1.1);
  }
  100% {
    transform: scale(1);
  }
}
@keyframes ConanShow {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
  }
}
@keyframes ConanUpIn {
  from {
    transform: translateY(20px);
    opacity: 0;
  }
  to {
    transform: translateY(0);
    opacity: 1;
  }
}
@keyframes close-icon-show {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: rotate(0);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: rotate(-90deg);
  }
}</style><script src="https://g.alicdn.com/akita/akita-sdk/index.js" charset="utf-8"></script><script src="https://g.alicdn.com/EdogawaConan/conan-js-sdk/index.js" charset="utf-8"></script><style type="text/css">.akita-container * {

}
.user-review-wrapper .user-review-btns .user-review-btn.good svg {

.user-review-wrapper .user-review-btns .user-review-btn.good svg path.shape {

}
.user-review-wrapper .user-review-btns .user-review-btn.good.not-disabled:hover path.background, .user-review-wrapper .user-review-btns .user-review-btn.good.not-disabled.active svg path.background {

}
.user-review-wrapper .user-review-btns .user-review-btn.good.not-disabled:hover path.shape, .user-review-wrapper .user-review-btns .user-review-btn.good.not-disabled.active svg path.shape {

}
.user-review-wrapper .user-review-btns .user-review-btn.bad.not-disabled:hover path.background, .user-review-wrapper .user-review-btns .user-review-btn.bad.not-disabled.active svg path.background {

}
.user-review-wrapper .user-review-btns .user-review-btn.bad.not-disabled:hover path.shape, .user-review-wrapper .user-review-btns .user-review-btn.bad.not-disabled.active svg path.shape {

.insight-component {
  position: fixed;
  right: 15px;
  bottom: 15px;
  z-index: 65534;
  border-radius: 3px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  color: #333;
  animation: 0.4s ConanShow;
  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, segoe ui, pingfang sc, hiragino sans gb, microsoft yahei, helvetica neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, apple color emoji, segoe ui emoji, segoe ui symbol;
}
.insight-component .conan-component-input {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  height: 40px;
  margin: 8px 0;
  padding: 6px;
  border: 1px solid #CCC;
  box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px #ddd;
  cursor: text;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}
.insight-component input[type=checkbox] {
  position: relative;
}
.insight-component input[type=checkbox]:after {
  content: " ";
  width: 10px;
  height: 10px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 12px;
  color: #333;
  background: #fff;
  border: 1px solid #888;
  line-height: 10px;
  border-radius: 2px;
  box-sizing: content-box;
}
.insight-component input[type=checkbox]:checked:after {
  content: "\2713";
}
.insight-component .insight-dnd-area {
  position: fixed;
  width: 100px;
  height: 100%;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  animation: 0.2s ConanShow;
  opacity: 0.5;
  transition: all 0.3s;
}
.insight-component .insight-dnd-area.active {
  opacity: 1;
}
.insight-component a {
  color: #1A6DF8;
}
.insight-component a:hover {
  color: #5695ff;
}
.insight-component.insight-component-insert-mode {
  position: relative;
  right: 0;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  box-shadow: none;
  animation: none;
  transition: none;
  top: 0;
}
.insight-component.insight-component-insert-mode .insight-layout {
  width: 100%;
  box-shadow: none;
  animation: none;
  transition: none;
  background: transparent;
  margin: 0;
}
.insight-component * {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  font-family: "Microsoft YaHei", Tahoma, Arial;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  border: 0;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: normal;
}
.insight-component input[type=checkbox] {
  margin-right: 3px;
  width: 12px;
  min-width: 12px;
  max-width: 12px;
  height: 12px;
  position: relative;
}
.insight-component input[type=checkbox]:before, .insight-component input[type=checkbox]:after {
  content: normal;
}
.insight-component a, .insight-component button, .insight-component input, .insight-component label {
  cursor: pointer;
}
.insight-component ul, .insight-component li {
  list-style: none;
}
.insight-component button, .insight-component input, .insight-component textarea {
  outline: none;
  font-size: 12px;
  transition: all 0.5s;
  resize: none;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-message-entry {
  position: relative;
  float: right;
  height: 27px;
  margin-bottom: 6px;
  cursor: pointer;
  background: #f1f1f1;
  padding: 3px 5px;
  border-radius: 3px;
  transition: all 0.3s;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-message-entry:hover {
  background: #ddd;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-message-entry > * {
  vertical-align: top;
  line-height: 18px;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-message-entry .msg-icon {
  display: inline-block;
  margin: 1px 3px 0 0;
  width: 18px;
  height: 18px;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-message-entry .unread-count {
  display: inline-block;
  width: 18px;
  height: 18px;
  line-height: 17px;
  margin: 1px 0 0 3px;
  background: #ff4a4a;
  border-radius: 50%;
  color: #fff;
  text-align: center;
}
.insight-component .insight-pop-tip {
  display: none;
  position: absolute;
  right: 50px;
  bottom: 0;
  height: 50px;
  padding: 10px 18px;
  margin-right: 15px;
  background: #fff;
  border-radius: 4px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 18px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  transition: all 0.3s;
  animation: 0.4s ConanRightIn;
}
.insight-component .insight-pop-tip-content {
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 30px;
  white-space: nowrap;
}
.insight-component .insight-pop-tip-content a {
  cursor: pointer;
  color: #1A6DF8;
}
.insight-component .insight-pop-tip-content a:hover {
  color: #5695ff;
}
.insight-component .insight-pop-tip:hover .insight-pop-tip-close {
  display: block;
  opacity: 1;
}
.insight-component .insight-pop-tip-close {
  opacity: 0;
  position: absolute;
  top: -10px;
  right: -10px;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background-image: url(https://img.alicdn.com/tfs/TB1TirlqNGYBuNjy0FnXXX5lpXa-32-32.png);
  background-size: 16px 16px;
  background-position: center;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.insight-component .insight-pop-tip-close:hover {
  filter: brightness(95%);
}
.insight-component .insight-pop-tip:before {
  position: absolute;
  content: "";
  width: 1px;
  height: 1px;
  bottom: 18px;
  right: -7px;
  border-left: 7px solid white;
  border-top: 6px solid transparent;
  border-bottom: 6px solid transparent;
}
.insight-component .insight-main-btn {
  position: absolute;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  font-size: 16px;
  color: #fff;
  z-index: 9999;
  border-radius: 3px;
  cursor: pointer;
  text-align: center;
  border-radius: 50%;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 18px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.01, 0.69, 0.49, 1);
}
.insight-component .insight-main-btn .insight-hide-icon {
  display: none;
}
.insight-component .insight-main-btn.insight-hidden {
  width: 12px;
  border-radius: 2px;
}
.insight-component .insight-main-btn.insight-hidden .open-icon, .insight-component .insight-main-btn.insight-hidden .close-icon, .insight-component .insight-main-btn.insight-hidden .insight-hide {
  display: none !important;
}
.insight-component .insight-main-btn.insight-hidden .insight-hide-icon {
  display: block;
  height: 10px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  margin-top: -5px;
  left: 2px;
}
.insight-component .insight-main-btn .close-icon {
  display: none;
}
.insight-component .insight-main-btn .open-icon {
  display: inline-block;
}
.insight-component .insight-main-btn.insight-main-panel-open .close-icon {
  display: inline-block;
}
.insight-component .insight-main-btn.insight-main-panel-open .open-icon {
  display: none;
}
.insight-component .icon {
  width: 1em;
  height: 1em;
  vertical-align: -0.15em;
  fill: currentColor;
  overflow: visible;
}
.insight-component .open-icon {
  width: 30px;
  height: 30px;
  margin-top: 11px;
  animation: 0.3s show;
}
.insight-component .open-icon.custom-icon {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  margin-top: 0;
}
.insight-component .close-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-top: 15px;
  animation: 0.3s close-icon-show;
}
.insight-component .insight-layout {
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 60px;
  z-index: 65535;
  width: 340px;
  padding: 12px;
  background: #FFF;
  font-size: 12px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 18px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  animation: 0.5s ConanUpIn;
  border-radius: 3px;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-rate,
.insight-component .insight-mod-type,
.insight-component .insight-mod-snapshot,
.insight-component .insight-mod-feedback {
  clear: both;
  transition: all 0.5s;
  margin: 8px 0;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-rate:after,
.insight-component .insight-mod-type:after,
.insight-component .insight-mod-snapshot:after,
.insight-component .insight-mod-feedback:after {
  content: "";
  display: block;
  clear: both;
}
.insight-component .insight-recording-status-icon {
  float: left;
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
  background: #ff0117;
  border-radius: 50%;
  margin: 3px 7px 0 0;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-success-layer {
  display: none;
  text-align: center;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-success-layer-main-title {
  color: #000;
  font-size: 18px;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-success-layer-main-title > * {
  vertical-align: middle;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-success-layer-sub-title {
  color: #000;
  font-size: 13px;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-success-layer img.success-hint-icon {
  height: 26px;
  margin-right: 2px;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-record-entry {
  z-index: 10;
  float: right;
  height: 0;
  text-align: right;
  position: relative;
  color: #555;
  transition: all 0.3s;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-record-entry-content {
  line-height: 15px;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-record-entry-content .insight-recording-icon {
  display: inline-block;
  margin-right: 3px;
  background: #ff0117;
  width: 12px;
  height: 12px;
  vertical-align: top;
  border-radius: 50%;
  margin-top: 3px;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-record-entry-content .insight-recording-text {
  display: inline-block;
  line-height: 16px;
  vertical-align: top;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-record-entry-content span {
  font-weight: 600;
  padding: 0 4px 1px 4px;
  margin: 0 0 0 2px;
  border: 1px solid #eee;
  border-radius: 2px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s;
  background: #fff;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-type {
  position: relative;
  background: #fff;
  color: #333;
  line-height: 28px;
  padding-top: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-type .insight-mt-selected {
  border: 1px solid #CCC;
  padding-left: 4px;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-type .insight-mt-selected:after {
  position: absolute;
  content: " ";
  background: url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAcAAAAECAYAAABCxiV9AAAABGdBTUEAALGPC/xhBQAAACBjSFJNAAB6JgAAgIQAAPoAAACA6AAAdTAAAOpgAAA6mAAAF3CculE8AAAABmJLR0QAAAAAAAD5Q7t/AAAACXBIWXMAAAsSAAALEgHS3X78AAAAKElEQVQI12Ps7Or6z4ADMDIwMDBgU1BeVsbICOMgKygvK2PEMAbdBAAhxA08t5Q3VgAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==) center center no-repeat;
  display: block;
  height: 30px;
  width: 30px;
  right: 0;
  top: 0;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-type .insight-mt-options {
  position: absolute;
  top: 28px;
  width: 100%;
  background-color: #fff;
  border: 1px solid #CCC;
  z-index: 300;
  display: none;
  transition: all 0.5s;
  overflow: auto;
  max-height: 150px;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-type .insight-mt-options .insight-mt-item {
  height: 28px;
  line-height: 30px;
  padding-left: 4px;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-type .insight-mt-options .insight-mt-item:hover {
  background-color: #f5F5F5;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-rate {
  text-align: center;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-rate .insight-ms-item {
  display: inline-block;
  color: #666;
  cursor: pointer;
  width: 20%;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-rate .insight-ms-item .insight-ms-icon {
  width: 1em;
  height: 1em;
  font-size: 36px;
  fill: #666;
  transition: all 0.5s;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-rate .insight-ms-item .insight-ms-title {
  display: block;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-rate .insight-ms-item:hover .insight-ms-icon {
  transform: scale(1.1);
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-rate .insight-ms-item.active {
  animation: 0.3s ConanZoomOutIn;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-rate .insight-ms-item.active .insight-ms-title,
.insight-component .insight-mod-rate .insight-ms-item.active .insight-ms-icon, .insight-component .insight-mod-rate .insight-ms-item:hover .insight-ms-title,
.insight-component .insight-mod-rate .insight-ms-item:hover .insight-ms-icon {
  font-weight: bold;
}
.insight-component .insight-ms-label {
  margin-bottom: 5px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  line-height: 15px;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-feedback .insight-mf-textarea {
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 64px;
  padding: 6px;
  vertical-align: top;
  border: 1px solid #CCC;
  box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px #DDD;
}
.insight-component .insight-error-msg {
  display: none;
  color: #ff0117;
  font-size: 12px;
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 4px;
}
.insight-component .insight-record-id {
  display: none;
  margin-top: 3px;
  text-align: center;
  color: #666;
}
.insight-component .insight-recording-btn .insight-record-authorize, .insight-component .insight-recording-btn .insight-record-confirm {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 8px 15px;
  font-size: 14px;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  border-radius: 10px;
  color: #fff;
  cursor: pointer;
  line-height: 21px;
}

.insight-main-btn:hover .insight-hide {
  display: block;
}

.insight-submit * {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  font-family: "Microsoft YaHei", Tahoma, Arial;
  font-size: 12px;
}
.insight-submit .insight-button.insight-button-submit {
  padding: 2px 14px;
  margin-top: 5px;
  line-height: 25px;
  font-size: 13px;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.insight-submit .insight-button-submit, .insight-submit .insight-button-authorize-ok, .insight-submit .insight-button-authorize-cc {
  width: 100%;
  border: 1px solid transparent;
  color: #FFF;
  line-height: 30px;
  outline: none;
  border-radius: 2px;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.insight-submit .insight-button-submit:hover, .insight-submit .insight-button-authorize-ok:hover, .insight-submit .insight-button-authorize-cc:hover {
  filter: brightness(95%);
}
.insight-submit .insight-button-authorize-ok {
  width: 100px;
}
.insight-submit .insight-button-authorize-cc {
  width: 100px;
  float: right;
}
.insight-submit .insight-button-disabled, .insight-submit .insight-button-authorize-cc {
  width: 100px;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  background: #ccc;
  color: #FFF;
}
.insight-submit .insight-button-disabled:hover, .insight-submit .insight-button-authorize-cc:hover {
  background: #ccc;
  border-color: #ccc;
}

.insight-hide {
  display: none;
  transition: all 0.3s;
  position: absolute;
  right: -9px;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  background: #0073FF;
  line-height: 17px;
  text-align: center;
  color: #fff;
  cursor: pointer;
  bottom: 41px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  font-weight: 600;
  opacity: 0.6;
  font-size: 20px;
}
.insight-hide:hover {
  opacity: 0.8;
}

.insight-canvas-modal.insight-modal * {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  font-family: "Microsoft YaHei", Tahoma, Arial;
  font-size: 12px;
}
.insight-canvas-modal.insight-modal .insight-modal-content {
  width: 1030px;
  padding-bottom: 20px;
}
.insight-canvas-modal.insight-modal .insight-modal-content .insight-modal-title {
  width: 100%;
  height: 50px;
  color: #000;
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 40px;
  padding: 0 15px;
}
.insight-canvas-modal.insight-modal .insight-modal-content .insight-modal-title img.modal-close {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-top: 10px;
  float: right;
  cursor: pointer;
  opacity: 0.5;
}
.insight-canvas-modal.insight-modal .insight-modal-content .insight-modal-title img.modal-close:hover {
  opacity: 1;
}
.insight-canvas-modal.insight-modal .insight-modal-content .insight-canvas-tools {
  width: 100%;
  height: 20px;
  padding: 0 15px;
  overflow: hidden;
}
.insight-canvas-modal.insight-modal .insight-modal-content .insight-canvas-tools img.tool-icon {
  width: 15px;
  height: 15px;
  position: absolute;
  left: 2px;
  top: 3px;
}
.insight-canvas-modal.insight-modal .insight-modal-content .insight-canvas-tools .mosaic img.tool-icon {
  top: 2px;
}
.insight-canvas-modal.insight-modal .insight-modal-content .insight-canvas-tools .tool-item {
  padding-left: 20px;
  position: relative;
  display: inline-block;
  margin-right: 10px;
  cursor: pointer;
  opacity: 0.8;
}
.insight-canvas-modal.insight-modal .insight-modal-content .insight-canvas-tools .tool-item:hover {
  opacity: 1;
}
.insight-canvas-modal.insight-modal .insight-modal-content .insight-canvas-tools .tool-item.active {
  opacity: 1;
  color: #0066FF;
  font-weight: 600;
}
.insight-canvas-modal.insight-modal .insight-modal-content .insight-edit-canvas-container {
  width: 1000px;
  height: 400px;
  overflow: hidden;
  margin: 10px 15px;
  border: 1px solid #eee;
}
.insight-canvas-modal.insight-modal .insight-modal-content .insight-edit-canvas {
  width: 1000px;
  height: 400px;
  transform-origin: 0 0;
}

.insight-mask {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;

.rc-cascader-menus.slide-up-leave {

  transform-origin: 0 0;

  animation-play-state: paused;

.rc-cascader-menus.slide-up-enter.slide-up-enter-active.rc-cascader-menus-placement-bottomLeft,
.rc-cascader-menus.slide-up-appear.slide-up-appear-active.rc-cascader-menus-placement-bottomLeft {

.rc-cascader-menus.slide-up-enter.slide-up-enter-active.rc-cascader-menus-placement-topLeft,
.rc-cascader-menus.slide-up-appear.slide-up-appear-active.rc-cascader-menus-placement-topLeft {
  animation-name: SlideDownIn;
  animation-play-state: running;

.rc-cascader-menus.slide-up-leave.slide-up-leave-active.rc-cascader-menus-placement-bottomLeft {
  animation-name: SlideUpOut;
  animation-play-state: running;
}

.rc-cascader-menus.slide-up-leave.slide-up-leave-active.rc-cascader-menus-placement-topLeft {
  animation-name: SlideDownOut;

</style><style>.sn-item-col-wrap {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  overflow: hidden;
  padding-right: 24px;
}

  opacity: 1;
  display: flex;
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-colitem-wrap.show-sn-select-wrap .sn-col-wrap .sn-col-item .col-item-label-wrap .sn-item-jt {
  transition: all 0.3s ease-out;
  /* 0.5秒的平滑过渡 */
  transform: rotate(180deg);
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-colitem-wrap .sn-col-wrap {
  --icon-arrow-background: #f5f5f5;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 24px;
  height: 40px;
  flex-wrap: nowrap;
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-colitem-wrap .sn-col-wrap .sn-col-item {
  cursor: pointer;
  position: relative;
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-colitem-wrap .sn-col-wrap .sn-col-item .col-item-label-wrap {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 4px;
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-colitem-wrap .sn-col-wrap .sn-col-item .col-item-label-wrap .col-item-label {
  font-family: PingFang SC;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: normal;
  line-height: 20px;
  letter-spacing: 0px;
  font-variation-settings: "opsz" auto;
  /* 文字色/主要文字 */
  color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87);
  z-index: 1;
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-colitem-wrap .sn-col-wrap .sn-col-item .col-item-label-wrap .sn-item-jt {
  width: 13px;
  height: 13px;
  background: url(https://gw.alicdn.com/imgextra/i1/O1CN01BahELu1jyBHRDWcjQ_!!6000000004616-2-tps-28-28.png) no-repeat;
  background-size: 100% 100%;
  background-position: center;
  transform: rotate(0deg);
  transition: all 0.3s ease-out;
  /* 0.5秒的平滑过渡 */
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-select-wrap {
  position: absolute;
  flex-direction: column;
  width: 200px;
  max-height: 168px;
  overflow-y: auto;
  /* 样式描述：中卡片，中输入框，中按钮等 */
  border-radius: 6px;
  opacity: 0;
  display: none;
  /* 背景色/白色 */
  background: #FFFFFF;
  /* 样式描述：默认使用，用于目录导航等在页面中属于中型面板的组件上 */
  box-shadow: 0px 4px 16px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.09);
  z-index: 11;
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-select-wrap::-webkit-scrollbar {
  width: 12px;
  /* 滚动条整体的宽度 */
  height: 12px;
  /* 水平滚动条的高度 */
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-select-wrap::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background-color: #888;
  /* 滑块的背景色 */
  border-radius: 6px;
  /* 滑块的圆角 */
  border: 3px solid #fff;
  /* 滑块的边框 */
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-select-wrap::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  /* 滚动条轨道的背景色 */
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-select-wrap .select-item {
  padding: 10px 8px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  font-size: 14px;
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-select-wrap .select-item:hover {
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
}
.sn-item-col-wrap .sn-select-wrap .select-item .selected {
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
}

  width: 112px;
  height: 44px;

.filter-items-button .filter-items-button-inner {
  width: 92px;

  margin: 0;
  border: 0;
  padding: 0;
  font-family: Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Tahoma, Arial, PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei;
}
.conan-entry-root .icon {
  width: 1em;
  height: 1em;
  vertical-align: -0.15em;
  fill: currentColor;
  overflow: visible;
}
.conan-entry-root .open-icon {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  animation: 0.3s show;
}
.conan-entry-root .close-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-top: 15px;
  animation: 0.3s close-icon-show;
}
.conan-entry-root .conan-entry-dnd-area {
  position: fixed;
  width: 100px;
  height: 100%;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  animation: 0.2s ConanShow;
  opacity: 0.5;
  transition: all 0.3s;
}
.conan-entry-root .conan-entry-dnd-area.active {
  opacity: 1;
}

.conan-entry-layout {
  transition: all 0.3s;
  font-family: Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Tahoma, Arial, PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel {
  animation: 0.3s ConanShow;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.main-entry-panel, .conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.panel-conan, .conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.panel-akita {
  width: 340px !important;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel .panel-header {
  position: relative;
  height: 45px;
  line-height: 45px;
  color: #fff;
  background: #1A6DF8;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel .panel-header .back-btn {
  cursor: pointer;
  display: block;
  position: absolute;
  left: 15px;
  font-size: 14px;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel .panel-header .back-btn .back-btn-icon {
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
  vertical-align: -0.15em;
  fill: currentColor;
  overflow: visible;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel .panel-header span.panel-name {
  text-align: center;
  width: 100%;
  display: block;
  font-size: 16px;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.main-entry-panel {
  background-color: #0e68fc;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: contain;
  background-position: top;
  color: #fff;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  padding-bottom: 1px;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.main-entry-panel .entry-card {
  margin: 10px;
  transition: all 0.3s;
  border-radius: 5px;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.main-entry-panel .entry-card:last-child {
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.main-entry-panel .entry-card:hover {
  box-shadow: 0 3px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35);
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.main-entry-panel .top-info {
  padding: 15px;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.main-entry-panel .top-info h3 {
  font-size: 24px;
  margin-bottom: 5px;
  color: #fff;
}
.conan-entry-layout .conan-entry-panel.main-entry-panel .top-info p {
  font-size: 16px;
}

.conan-entry-container {
  position: fixed;
  right: 15px;
  bottom: 15px;
  z-index: 65534;
  border-radius: 3px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  color: #333;
  animation: 0.4s ConanShow;
}
.conan-entry-container, .conan-entry-container * {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.conan-entry-layout {
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 60px;
  z-index: 65535;
  background: #FFF;
  font-size: 12px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 18px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  animation: 0.5s ConanUpIn;
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.conan-entry-pop-tip {
  display: none;
  position: absolute;
  right: 50px;
  bottom: 0;
  min-height: 50px;
  padding: 10px 18px;
  margin-right: 15px;
  background: #fff;
  border-radius: 4px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 18px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  transition: all 0.3s;
  animation: 0.4s ConanRightIn;
}
.conan-entry-pop-tip a {
  display: inline-block;
  cursor: pointer;
  color: #1A6DF8;
}
.conan-entry-pop-tip a:hover {
  color: #5695ff;
}
.conan-entry-pop-tip-content {
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 30px;
  white-space: pre;
}
.conan-entry-pop-tip:hover .conan-entry-pop-tip-close {
  display: block;
  opacity: 1;
}
.conan-entry-pop-tip-close {
  opacity: 0;
  position: absolute;
  top: -10px;
  right: -10px;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background-color: #1A6DF8;
  background-image: url(https://img.alicdn.com/tfs/TB1TirlqNGYBuNjy0FnXXX5lpXa-32-32.png);
  background-size: 16px 16px;
  background-position: center;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.conan-entry-pop-tip-close:hover {
  background-color: #0066FF;
}
.conan-entry-pop-tip:before {
  position: absolute;
  content: "";
  width: 1px;
  height: 1px;
  bottom: 18px;
  right: -7px;
  border-left: 7px solid white;
  border-top: 6px solid transparent;
  border-bottom: 6px solid transparent;
}

.conan-entry-main-btn {
  position: absolute;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background-color: #1A6DF8;
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  font-size: 16px;
  color: #fff;
  z-index: 9999;
  border-radius: 3px;
  cursor: pointer;
  text-align: center;
  border-radius: 50%;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 18px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.01, 0.69, 0.49, 1);
}
.conan-entry-main-btn:hover .conan-entry-hide {
  display: block;
}
.conan-entry-main-btn .conan-entry-hide {
  display: none;
  transition: all 0.3s;
  position: absolute;
  right: -9px;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  background: #0073FF;
  line-height: 17px;
  text-align: center;
  color: #fff;
  cursor: pointer;
  bottom: 41px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  font-weight: 600;
  opacity: 0.6;
  font-size: 20px;
}
.conan-entry-main-btn .conan-entry-hide:hover {
  opacity: 0.8;
}
.conan-entry-main-btn .conan-entry-hide-icon {
  display: none;
}
.conan-entry-main-btn.conan-entry-hidden {
  width: 12px;
  border-radius: 2px;
}
.conan-entry-main-btn.conan-entry-hidden .open-icon, .conan-entry-main-btn.conan-entry-hidden .close-icon, .conan-entry-main-btn.conan-entry-hidden .conan-entry-hide {
  display: none !important;
}
.conan-entry-main-btn.conan-entry-hidden .conan-entry-hide-icon {
  display: block;
  height: 10px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  margin-top: -5px;
  left: 2px;
}

@keyframes ConanFadeDown {
  0% {
    transform: translateY(-65%);
    opacity: 0;
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    opacity: 1;
  }
}
@keyframes ConanRightIn {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(20px);
    opacity: 0;
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateX(0);
    opacity: 1;
  }
}
@keyframes ConanZoomOutIn {
  0% {
    transform: scale(1);
  }
  50% {
    transform: scale(1.1);
  }
  100% {
    transform: scale(1);
  }
}
@keyframes ConanShow {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
  }
}
@keyframes ConanUpIn {
  from {
    transform: translateY(20px);
    opacity: 0;
  }
  to {
    transform: translateY(0);
    opacity: 1;
  }
}
@keyframes close-icon-show {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: rotate(0);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: rotate(-90deg);
  }
}</style><script src="https://g.alicdn.com/akita/akita-sdk/index.js" charset="utf-8"></script><script src="https://g.alicdn.com/EdogawaConan/conan-js-sdk/index.js" charset="utf-8"></script><style type="text/css">.akita-container * {
  border: 0;
  margin: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  font-size: 13px;
}
.akita-container a {
  color: #1A6DF8;
}
.akita-container a:hover {
  color: #5695ff;
}
.akita-container ul, .akita-container menu, .akita-container dir {
  display: block;
  list-style-type: disc;
  margin-block-start: 5px;
  margin-block-end: 5px;
  margin-inline-start: 0px;
  margin-inline-end: 0px;
  padding-inline-start: 20px;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .chat-head {
  width: 100%;
  height: 50px;
  line-height: 50px;
  font-size: 18px;
  background: #2c83db;
  color: #fff;
  padding: 0 15px;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .chat-messages {
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  height: 400px;
  padding: 5px;
  overflow-y: auto;
  overflow-x: hidden;
  background: #fff;
  padding-bottom: 30px;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .chat-messages .message-item {
  position: relative;
  max-width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  margin: 8px 0 0 0;
  line-height: 1.6;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .chat-messages .message-item > * {
  display: inline-block;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .chat-messages .message-item.self {
  margin-left: 40px;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .chat-messages .message-item.self > * {
  float: right;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .chat-messages .message-item.self .message-content {
  background: #BAE7FF;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .chat-messages .message-item.robot {
  margin-right: 40px;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .chat-messages .message-item.robot > * {
  float: left;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .chat-messages .message-item.robot .message-content {
  background: #F7F8FA;
  border: 1px solid #E9EEF3;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .chat-messages .message-item .message-avatar {
  width: 34px;
  height: 34px;
  line-height: 34px;
  overflow: hidden;
  border-radius: 50%;
  margin: 0 8px;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .chat-messages .message-item .message-avatar img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .chat-messages .message-item .message-content-wrapper {
  max-width: 70%;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .chat-messages .message-item .message-content-wrapper .message-content {
  overflow: hidden;
  border-radius: 4px;
  text-align: left;
  padding: 8px 10px;
  color: #333;
  word-break: break-all;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .chat-messages .message-item .message-content-wrapper .message-content img {
  max-width: 100%;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .chat-messages .message-item .message-content-wrapper .message-content img:hover {
  cursor: zoom-in;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .to-conan-panel {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 60px;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 3px 0;
  text-align: center;
  background: #f9f9f9;
  border-top: 1px solid #eee;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .chat-input {
  background: #f1f1f1;
  padding: 10px;
}
.akita-container .chat-panel .chat-input input {
  width: 100%;
  height: 40px;
  padding: 10px;
  font-size: 14px;
  outline: none;
  border-radius: 4px;
}

.akita-fancybox-container {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  z-index: 65535;
}
.akita-fancybox-container * {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  font-family: "Microsoft YaHei", Tahoma, Arial;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  border: 0;
}
.akita-fancybox-container .akita-fancybox-mask {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.75);
}
.akita-fancybox-container img {
  position: absolute;
  max-width: 80%;
  max-height: 80%;
  z-index: 10;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  display: block;
}</style><style type="text/css">.akita-entry-card {
  width: 100%;
  background: #fff;
  color: #000;
  border-radius: 3px;
  font-size: 14px;
}
.akita-entry-card.size-small .hot-questions {
  padding: 4px 0;
}
.akita-entry-card.size-small .akita-panel-entry {
  padding: 4px 0 0 0;
  font-size: 14px;
}
.akita-entry-card .hot-questions {
  padding: 15px;
}
.akita-entry-card .hot-questions-title {
  font-size: 15px;
  line-height: 30px;
  font-weight: 600;
  position: relative;
  top: -3px;
}
.akita-entry-card .hot-questions-item {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: normal;
  line-height: 30px;
  cursor: pointer;

}

}

.user-review-wrapper .user-review-btns .user-review-btn.bad svg {

.user-review-wrapper .user-review-btns .user-review-btn.bad svg path.background {

}
.user-review-wrapper .user-review-btns .user-review-btn.bad svg path.shape {
  fill: #C9D1DC;
  transition: all 0.3s;
}
.user-review-wrapper .user-review-btns .user-review-btn.bad.not-disabled:hover path.background, .user-review-wrapper .user-review-btns .user-review-btn.bad.not-disabled.active svg path.background {
  fill-opacity: 1;
}
.user-review-wrapper .user-review-btns .user-review-btn.bad.not-disabled:hover path.shape, .user-review-wrapper .user-review-btns .user-review-btn.bad.not-disabled.active svg path.shape {

  background: #0071fc;

.insight-component {
  position: fixed;
  right: 15px;
  bottom: 15px;
  z-index: 65534;
  border-radius: 3px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  color: #333;
  animation: 0.4s ConanShow;
  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, segoe ui, pingfang sc, hiragino sans gb, microsoft yahei, helvetica neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, apple color emoji, segoe ui emoji, segoe ui symbol;
}
.insight-component .conan-component-input {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  height: 40px;
  margin: 8px 0;
  padding: 6px;
  border: 1px solid #CCC;
  box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px #ddd;
  cursor: text;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}
.insight-component input[type=checkbox] {
  position: relative;
}
.insight-component input[type=checkbox]:after {
  content: " ";
  width: 10px;
  height: 10px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 12px;
  color: #333;
  background: #fff;
  border: 1px solid #888;
  line-height: 10px;
  border-radius: 2px;
  box-sizing: content-box;
}
.insight-component input[type=checkbox]:checked:after {
  content: "\2713";
}
.insight-component .insight-dnd-area {
  position: fixed;
  width: 100px;
  height: 100%;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  animation: 0.2s ConanShow;
  opacity: 0.5;
  transition: all 0.3s;
}
.insight-component .insight-dnd-area.active {
  opacity: 1;
}
.insight-component a {
  color: #1A6DF8;
}
.insight-component a:hover {
  color: #5695ff;
}
.insight-component.insight-component-insert-mode {
  position: relative;
  right: 0;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  box-shadow: none;
  animation: none;
  transition: none;
  top: 0;
}
.insight-component.insight-component-insert-mode .insight-layout {
  width: 100%;
  box-shadow: none;
  animation: none;
  transition: none;
  background: transparent;
  margin: 0;
}
.insight-component * {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  font-family: "Microsoft YaHei", Tahoma, Arial;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  border: 0;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: normal;
}
.insight-component input[type=checkbox] {
  margin-right: 3px;
  width: 12px;
  min-width: 12px;
  max-width: 12px;
  height: 12px;
  position: relative;
}
.insight-component input[type=checkbox]:before, .insight-component input[type=checkbox]:after {
  content: normal;
}
.insight-component a, .insight-component button, .insight-component input, .insight-component label {
  cursor: pointer;
}
.insight-component ul, .insight-component li {
  list-style: none;
}
.insight-component button, .insight-component input, .insight-component textarea {
  outline: none;
  font-size: 12px;
  transition: all 0.5s;
  resize: none;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-message-entry {
  position: relative;
  float: right;
  height: 27px;
  margin-bottom: 6px;
  cursor: pointer;
  background: #f1f1f1;
  padding: 3px 5px;
  border-radius: 3px;
  transition: all 0.3s;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-message-entry:hover {
  background: #ddd;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-message-entry > * {
  vertical-align: top;
  line-height: 18px;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-message-entry .msg-icon {

  width: 18px;
  height: 18px;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-message-entry .unread-count {

  color: #fff;
  text-align: center;
}
.insight-component .insight-pop-tip {
  display: none;

  bottom: 0;
  height: 50px;
  padding: 10px 18px;
  margin-right: 15px;
  background: #fff;
  border-radius: 4px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 18px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);

  font-size: 14px;

}
.insight-component .insight-pop-tip-content a:hover {
  color: #5695ff;
}
.insight-component .insight-pop-tip:hover .insight-pop-tip-close {
  display: block;

}
.insight-component .insight-pop-tip-close {
  opacity: 0;

  border-bottom: 6px solid transparent;

}
.insight-component .insight-main-btn.insight-hidden .insight-hide-icon {

  margin-top: -5px;

.insight-component .insight-main-btn .close-icon {

}
.insight-component .insight-main-btn .open-icon {

}
.insight-component .insight-main-btn.insight-main-panel-open .close-icon {

}
.insight-component .insight-main-btn.insight-main-panel-open .open-icon {
  display: none;
}
.insight-component .icon {
  width: 1em;
  height: 1em;
  vertical-align: -0.15em;
  fill: currentColor;
  overflow: visible;
}
.insight-component .open-icon {
  width: 30px;
  height: 30px;
  margin-top: 11px;
  animation: 0.3s show;
}
.insight-component .open-icon.custom-icon {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  margin-top: 0;
}
.insight-component .close-icon {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-top: 15px;
  animation: 0.3s close-icon-show;
}
.insight-component .insight-layout {
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 60px;
  z-index: 65535;
  width: 340px;
  padding: 12px;
  background: #FFF;
  font-size: 12px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 18px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  animation: 0.5s ConanUpIn;
  border-radius: 3px;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-rate,
.insight-component .insight-mod-type,
.insight-component .insight-mod-snapshot,
.insight-component .insight-mod-feedback {
  clear: both;
  transition: all 0.5s;
  margin: 8px 0;
}
.insight-component .insight-mod-rate:after,
.insight-component .insight-mod-type:after,
.insight-component .insight-mod-snapshot:after,
.insight-component .insight-mod-feedback:after {
  content: "";
  display: block;
  clear: both;
}
.insight-component .insight-recording-status-icon {
  float: left;
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
  background: #ff0117;
  border-radius: 50%;
  margin: 3px 7px 0 0;
}

  display: none;

}

  color: #000;

}

}
.insight-component .insight-mod-success-layer-sub-title {
  color: #000;

}

}
.insight-component .insight-mod-record-entry-content .insight-recording-icon {

}

  display: block;

.insight-component .insight-mod-rate .insight-ms-item.active .insight-ms-icon, .insight-component .insight-mod-rate .insight-ms-item:hover .insight-ms-title,
.insight-component .insight-mod-rate .insight-ms-item:hover .insight-ms-icon {

  font-size: 12px;
}

.rc-cascader-menus {
  font-size: 12px;
  overflow: hidden;
  background: #fff;
  position: absolute;
  border: 1px solid #d9d9d9;
  border-radius: 6px;
  box-shadow: 0 0 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.17);
  white-space: nowrap;
}

.rc-cascader-menus-hidden {
  display: none;
}

.rc-cascader-menus.slide-up-enter,
.rc-cascader-menus.slide-up-appear {
  animation-duration: 0.3s;
  animation-fill-mode: both;
  transform-origin: 0 0;
  opacity: 0;
  animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.08, 0.82, 0.17, 1);
  animation-play-state: paused;
}

.rc-cascader-menus.slide-up-leave {
  animation-duration: 0.3s;
  animation-fill-mode: both;
  transform-origin: 0 0;
  opacity: 1;
  animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.6, 0.04, 0.98, 0.34);
  animation-play-state: paused;
}

.rc-cascader-menus.slide-up-enter.slide-up-enter-active.rc-cascader-menus-placement-bottomLeft,
.rc-cascader-menus.slide-up-appear.slide-up-appear-active.rc-cascader-menus-placement-bottomLeft {
  animation-name: SlideUpIn;
  animation-play-state: running;
}

.rc-cascader-menus.slide-up-enter.slide-up-enter-active.rc-cascader-menus-placement-topLeft,
.rc-cascader-menus.slide-up-appear.slide-up-appear-active.rc-cascader-menus-placement-topLeft {
  animation-name: SlideDownIn;
  animation-play-state: running;
}

.rc-cascader-menus.slide-up-leave.slide-up-leave-active.rc-cascader-menus-placement-bottomLeft {
  animation-name: SlideUpOut;
  animation-play-state: running;
}

.rc-cascader-menus.slide-up-leave.slide-up-leave-active.rc-cascader-menus-placement-topLeft {
  animation-name: SlideDownOut;
  animation-play-state: running;
}

.rc-cascader-menu {
  display: inline-block;
  width: 100px;
  height: 192px;
  list-style: none;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  border-right: 1px solid #e9e9e9;
  overflow: auto;
}

.rc-cascader-menu:last-child {
  border-right: 0;
}

.rc-cascader-menu-item {
  height: 32px;
  line-height: 32px;
  padding: 0 16px;
  cursor: pointer;
  white-space: nowrap;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  position: relative;
}

.rc-cascader-menu-item:hover {
  background: #eaf8fe;
}

.rc-cascader-menu-item-disabled {
  cursor: not-allowed;
  color: #ccc;
}

.rc-cascader-menu-item-disabled:hover {
  background: transparent;
}

.rc-cascader-menu-item-loading:after {
  position: absolute;
  right: 12px;
  content: "loading";
  color: #aaa;
  font-style: italic;
}

.rc-cascader-menu-item-active {
  background: #d5f1fd;
}

.rc-cascader-menu-item-active:hover {
  background: #d5f1fd;
}

.rc-cascader-menu-item-expand {
  position: relative;
}

.rc-cascader-menu-item-expand-icon {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: #999;
  position: absolute;
  right: 16px;
  line-height: 32px;
}

@keyframes SlideUpIn {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    transform-origin: 0% 0%;
    transform: scaleY(0.8);
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform-origin: 0% 0%;
    transform: scaleY(1);
  }
}
@keyframes SlideUpOut {
  0% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform-origin: 0% 0%;
    transform: scaleY(1);
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 0;
    transform-origin: 0% 0%;
    transform: scaleY(0.8);
  }
}
@keyframes SlideDownIn {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    transform-origin: 0% 100%;
    transform: scaleY(0.8);
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform-origin: 0% 100%;
    transform: scaleY(1);
  }
}
@keyframes SlideDownOut {
  0% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform-origin: 0% 100%;
    transform: scaleY(1);
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 0;
    transform-origin: 0% 100%;
    transform: scaleY(0.8);
  }
}</style><style type="text/css">.insight-radio-container-label {
  line-height: 24px;
  color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8509803922);
  font-size: 12px;
}

.insight-radio-group {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  justify-content: flex-start;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.insight-radio-label {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-right: 10px;
  line-height: 24px;
}
.insight-radio-label input {
  display: inline-block;
  width: 13px;
  height: 13px;
  margin-right: 3px;
}

.insight-cascader-selector {
  padding: 8px 6px;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  width: 100%;
  margin: 8px 0;
  box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px #ddd;
  display: flex;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.insight-cascader-selector-input {
  flex: 1;
  background: transparent;
  color: #222;
}
.insight-cascader-selector-icon {
  color: #ccc;
  border-left: 1px solid #000;
  padding-left: 6px;
  opacity: 0.3;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}
.insight-cascader-selector:hover .insight-cascader-selector-icon {
  opacity: 0.6;
}

.insight-cascader-popup {
  z-index: 65535;
  min-height: 100px;
  border-radius: 2px;
}</style><style type="text/css">.conan-entry-card {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 12px 15px;
  background: #fff;
  border-radius: 3px;
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 30px;
}
.conan-entry-card > span {
  cursor: pointer;
}
.conan-entry-card .conan-panel-entry {
  color: #1A6DF8;
  transition: all 0.3s;
  font-size: 15px;
  line-height: 24px;
}
.conan-entry-card .conan-panel-entry:hover {
  color: #5695ff;
}
.conan-entry-card .reply-modal-entry {
  position: relative;
  top: -1px;
  float: right;
  display: block;
  width: 46px;
  height: 36px;
  background-image: url(https://img.alicdn.com/tfs/TB1MIPhQr2pK1RjSZFsXXaNlXXa-92-72.png);
  background-size: 46px 36px;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  transition: all 0.3s;
}
.conan-entry-card .reply-modal-entry:hover {
  transform: scale(1.11);
}
.conan-entry-card .reply-modal-entry .unread-count {
  position: absolute;
  width: 14px;
  height: 14px;
  background: #FF5D00;
  border-radius: 50%;
  font-size: 12px;
  line-height: 14px;
  text-align: center;
  right: -1px;
  top: -3px;
}</style><script async="" src="//log.mmstat.com/eg.js?t=1760604169878"></script></head>
